summary: Frontend Team Lead with 10+ years building production web applications for international clients across e-commerce, IoT, and Web3. Currently leading 7-engineer frontend team implementing micro-frontend architecture with Lit and TypeScript. Proven track record delivering high-performance applications (Lighthouse 30â†’90+ optimization), establishing comprehensive testing practices, and mentoring developers across async/distributed teams spanning US, EU, and LATAM time zones. Deep expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript ecosystems with strong focus on code quality and system design.

experience.title: Frontend Team Lead
experience.description: Lead 7-engineer frontend team for enterprise consulting project, managing technical architecture and team performance. Develop features within established micro-frontend architecture using Lit web components and TypeScript.
achievements: Delivered production features within micro-frontend architecture using Lit web components and TypeScript
Established code review standards and technical decision-making process for the engineering team
Mentored engineers on TypeScript patterns, web components, and system design principles
Configured testing strategies and CI/CD pipelines maintaining code quality standards
Led technical discussions with stakeholders driving alignment on technical roadmap

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Built production-grade user interfaces for decentralized hosting platform serving developers deploying Web3 applications. Worked in fully asynchronous remote team across multiple time zones (US, EU, LATAM).
achievements: Built core UI components for decentralized hosting platform using React and Next.js
Developed AI-powered conversational chatbot with image generation using LangChain and Eliza framework
Optimized application performance from Lighthouse 30s to 90+ through code splitting, lazy loading, and bundle optimization
Implemented state management architecture with Zustand handling complex application state

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected and developed high-performance web applications using Next.js and TypeScript for carbon management platform. Led frontend optimization efforts for performance, accessibility, and SEO.
achievements: Engineered enterprise dashboard with Next.js achieving Lighthouse scores of 90+
Designed and implemented comprehensive testing suite with Jest and React Testing Library
Optimized Core Web Vitals metrics and integrated SEO best practices with meta tags
Conducted technical code reviews ensuring architectural consistency
Shipped WCAG 2.1 AA compliant interfaces for accessibility compliance

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Delivered enterprise-grade frontend solutions for major international clients including Vodafone Germany, Ibersol Group, and Dreamlines cruise platform. Led technical initiatives and mentored junior engineers.
achievements: Architected and delivered WordPress to React migration for e-commerce platform, building product catalog, galleries, and payment integration
Established testing strategy with Jest, Testing Library, and Cypress, improving code reliability across team
Conducted technical assessments and interviews for engineering candidates, mentored 2-3 junior developers on React patterns and testing practices
Shipped features for enterprise clients including Vodafone Germany and Ibersol Group
Automated build and deployment processes through Jenkins CI/CD pipelines

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to frontend development for Anova's IoT petrochemical monitoring platform and YOOX Net-a-Porter's luxury e-commerce site (The Outnet). Worked closely with architects on micro-frontend implementation.
achievements: Implemented micro-frontend modules for Anova's IoT platform working closely with system architects
Shipped features for The Outnet e-commerce platform integrating CoreMedia CMS for editorial content management
Engineered real-time dashboard for Anova monitoring petrochemical industry sensors
Reduced frontend bundle size through strategic code-splitting and lazy loading implementation
Conducted technical interviews for engineering candidates and mentored junior developers on React patterns
